mapper.select:
SELECT /*模块：接送货-运单-查询待处理运单*/
FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING P WHERE P.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (P.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR P.ORDER_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT /*模块：接送货-运单-查询待处理运单*/
FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING P WHERE 1=1
AND P.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (P.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR P.ORDER_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT /*模块：接送货-运单-从pending中查询PDA接货记录*/ PENDING.WAYBILL_NO WAYBILLNO, PENDING.GOODS_WEIGHT_TOTAL WEIGHT, PENDING.GOODS_QTY_TOTAL PIECES, PENDING.GOODS_VOLUME_TOTAL VOLUME, PENDING.PRE_PAY_AMOUNT/100 PAYAMOUNT, PENDING.Return_Bill_Type ISHAVESIGNBILL, PENDING.LICENSE_PLATE_NUM VEHICLENO, PENDING.BILL_TIME BILLTIME FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING PENDING
WHERE PENDING.BILL_TIME >= #{queryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND PENDING.BILL_TIME < TRUNC(SYSDATE)+1 AND PENDING.DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PENDING.PENDING_TYPE = #{pendingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /*模块：接送货-运单-从运单表中查询ＰＤＡ接货记录*/ WAYBILL.WAYBILL_NO WAYBILLNO, WAYBILL.GOODS_WEIGHT_TOTAL WEIGHT, WAYBILL.GOODS_QTY_TOTAL PIECES, WAYBILL.GOODS_VOLUME_TOTAL VOLUME, WAYBILL.PRE_PAY_AMOUNT/100 PAYAMOUNT, WAYBILL.return_bill_type ISHAVESIGNBILL, WAYBILL.LICENSE_PLATE_NUM VEHICLENO, WAYBILL.BILL_TIME BILLTIME FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL WAYBILL
WHERE WAYBILL.BILL_TIME >= #{queryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND WAYBILL.BILL_TIME < TRUNC(SYSDATE)+1 AND WAYBILL.DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND WAYBILL.PENDING_TYPE = #{pendingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and waybill.active = 'Y'

SELECT P.CREATE_ORG_CODE FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING P WHERE P.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (P.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR P.ORDER_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and rownum=1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING P WHERE P.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /*模块：接送货-运单-从运单表中查询ＰＤＡ接货记录*/ WAYBILL.WAYBILL_NO WAYBILLNO, WAYBILL.GOODS_WEIGHT_TOTAL WEIGHT, WAYBILL.GOODS_QTY_TOTAL PIECES, WAYBILL.GOODS_VOLUME_TOTAL VOLUME, WAYBILL.PRE_PAY_AMOUNT/100 PAYAMOUNT, WAYBILL.return_bill_type ISHAVESIGNBILL, WAYBILL.LICENSE_PLATE_NUM VEHICLENO, WAYBILL.BILL_TIME BILLTIME FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL WAYBILL
WHERE WAYBILL.BILL_TIME >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND WAYBILL.BILL_TIME < #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND WAYBILL.DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND WAYBILL.PENDING_TYPE = #{pendingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and waybill.active = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(1) /*模块：接送货-待补录运单-从待补录运单表中查询有相同运单号的运单数量*/ FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING P WHERE P.WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /*模块： 接送货-快递运单-从运单表中查询ＰＤＡ接货记录*/ WAYBILL.WAYBILL_NO WAYBILLNO, WAYBILL.GOODS_WEIGHT_TOTAL WEIGHT, WAYBILL.GOODS_QTY_TOTAL PIECES, WAYBILL.GOODS_VOLUME_TOTAL VOLUME, WAYBILL.PRE_PAY_AMOUNT/100 PAYAMOUNT, WAYBILL.return_bill_type ISHAVESIGNBILL, WAYBILL.LICENSE_PLATE_NUM VEHICLENO, WAYBILL.BILL_TIME BILLTIME, NVL(AC.PDA_PAID_METHOD,WAYBILL.PAID_METHOD) PAIDMETHOD, AC.WAYBILL_TYPE WAYBILL_TYPE,
DECODE(E.BANK_TRADE_SERIAL,NULL,0,WAYBILL.PRE_PAY_AMOUNT/100) CARD_INCOME, DECODE(E.BANK_TRADE_SERIAL,NULL,AC.PDA_PRE_PAY_AMOUNT/100,0) CASH_INCOME FROM (PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL WAYBILL LEFT JOIN PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT AC ON WAYBILL.WAYBILL_NO=AC.WAYBILL_NO) LEFT JOIN PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_EXPRESS E ON WAYBILL.WAYBILL_NO=E.WAYBILL_NO
WHERE WAYBILL.BILL_TIME >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND WAYBILL.BILL_TIME < #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND WAYBILL.DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and waybill.active = 'Y'

SELECT /*模块：接送货-运单-从运单表中统计电子运单中待激活运单条数*/ WAYBILL.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_ID contactCode,WAYBILL.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_CONTACT contactName,ORD.IS_COLLECT isCollectGps, COUNT(WAYBILL.ID) eWaybillTotal, TRIM (WAYBILL.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS) ADDRESS, TRIM(waybill.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_MOBILEPHONE) MOBILEPHONE, TRIM(waybill.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_PHONE) officePhone FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING WAYBILL LEFT JOIN PKP.T_SRV_DISPATCH_ORDER ORD ON ORD.ORDER_NO = WAYBILL.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN PKP.T_SRV_ACTUAL_FREIGHT AC ON AC.WAYBILL_NO = WAYBILL.WAYBILL_NO WHERE WAYBILL.PENDING_TYPE = 'EWAYBILL_PRE_ACTIVE' AND WAYBILL.ACTIVE = 'N' AND WAYBILL.WAYBILL_TYPE = 'EWAYBILL' AND WAYBILL.BILL_TIME > TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 AND ORD.IS_EWAYBILL_BIGCUSTOMER='Y' AND AC.STATUS='UNACTIVE' AND WAYBILL.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_ID IS NOT NULL
AND (WAYBILL.DRIVER_CODE = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND WAYBILL.DRIVER_CODE IS NOT NULL)
AND (WAYBILL.LICENSE_PLATE_NUM = #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND WAYBILL.LICENSE_PLATE_NUM IS NOT NULL)
AND ORD.ORDER_STATUS IN
#{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY WAYBILL.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_ID,ORD.IS_COLLECT, TRIM (WAYBILL.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS), TRIM(waybill.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_MOBILEPHONE),WAYBILL.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_CONTACT, TRIM(waybill.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_PHONE) ORDER BY WAYBILL.DELIVERY_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_ID

SELECT /*模块：接送货-运单-从运单表中查询超期电子运单*/
FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_PENDING WHERE CREATE_TIME < TRUNC(SYSDATE) - #{overDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ACTIVE = 'N' AND PENDING_TYPE = 'EWAYBILL_PRE_ACTIVE' AND WAYBILL_TYPE='EWAYBILL' AND CREATE_TIME > #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY CREATE_TIME

WHERE P.ID IN
#{Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE P.ID=''
AND P.WAYBILL_TYPE='EWAYBILL'
